search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Wise Agent CRM (wise-agent-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Wise Agent CRM can be found at this URL: [https://wiseagent.com/pricing](https://wiseagent.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Wise Agent CRM Pricing | Start Your Free Trial Today

extracted_content.content:
[![Image 1: Wise Agent Logo](https://wiseagent.com/SECURE/assets/images/logos/WiseAgentLogo01.svg)](https://wiseagent.com/)

Included In All Plans
---------------------

*   Drip Marketing Campaigns
*   Lead Automation
*   Team-Friendly Calendar
*   Free 24/7 support
*   Transaction Manager
*   Contact Manager

*   Customizable Landing Pages
*   Unlimited Training
*   Lead Enhancement
*   Unlimited Document Storage
*   Monthly Newsletter
*   Reporting Tools

MONTHLY

$49 / mo

Complimentary one-on-one onboarding included

ANNUAL

$499 / yr

Save 15% $588 / yr

Complimentary one-on-one onboarding included

Saves 15% compared to standard monthly plan

ENTERPRISE

Custom

Bulk Liscensing - Recommended for teams of 15+ Agents

White Label Solutions

**Plus:** 24/7 x 365 Live Support. Stay month-to-month with **no contracts.**

Additional Features
-------------------

[### Additional Team Members](https://wiseagent.com/pricing.asp#collapseAdd1)

Basic Plan

##### 1 Account Holder

##### 4 Team Members

Additional Feature

$ 20 /mo.

##### Additional 5 Team Members

more available, pay per batch of 5

[### Additional Logins](https://wiseagent.com/pricing.asp#collapseAdd2)

Basic Plan

##### One Login For All Accounts

Additional Feature

$ 20 /mo.

##### Individual Login For Team Member

this feature allows for permissions and restrictions to be put in place so the administrator of the account can decide what a team member is able to access.

[### Lead Enhancement](https://wiseagent.com/pricing.asp#collapseAdd3)

Basic Plan

##### 100 Free Credits

1 use = 1 credit

Additional Feature

$ 5 /mo.

##### Unlimited Credits

[### WiseText SMS](https://wiseagent.com/pricing.asp#collapseAdd4)

Basic Plan

##### None

Additional Feature

$ 11 /mo. + $ 80 registration fee

##### Texting Feature With Number Selection

1000 credits per month  
\* more can be purchased if needed

[### Additional Landing Pages](https://wiseagent.com/pricing.asp#collapseAdd5)

Basic Plan

##### 1 Active Landing Page

Additional Feature

$ 5 /mo.

##### 2+ Active Landing Pages

pay per additional active landing page

”

![Image 2: Donna Stott Image](https://wiseagent.com/SECURE/assets/images/testimonials/Donna-bw.png)

Donna Stott

REAL ESTATE COACH

What Brandon has done is give you a $10K a year product for just $49/month. Unbelievable."

”

![Image 3: Micahel Hellickson Image](https://wiseagent.com/SECURE/assets/images/testimonials/Michael-Bw.png)

Michael Hellickson

REAL ESTATE COACH

Wise Agent is an extremely affordable yet surprisingly robust and highly integrable CRM. FANTASTIC!!

Ready to Run a Business?
------------------------

Sign up for Wise Agent today and start running your business more efficiently and effectively!

Our real estate CRM pricing includes a 14 day free trial and 24/7 support! For only $49/month we provide a variety of services suited for you and your clients!

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes options for additional features and enterprise solutions.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Custom pricing for teams of 15+ agents.

additional_fees.fee_description: One-time registration fee for WiseText SMS feature.
